!MESSAGE Can not set data in clipboard
!STACK 0

This happens at least on Sun SDK 1.3.1_07, 1.4.1_01 and IBM SDK 1.3.1.

What Eclipse build are you using?
Do you have steps to reproduce this problem?

At the moment I'm using Eclipse M5.


But this problem I have since Eclipse 2.0.1.

Do you have ReGet Deluxe installed?  Are you using Mozilla?  People have 
reported intermitant problems in the past but I have been unable to get a 
reproducible case on my XP machine.  There may be an interaction with another 
application such as one that allows you to examine the contents of the 
clipboard - do you use any such application?

Yes I have ReGet Delux 3.2 installed.
I haven't Mozilla installed but I've Netscape Navigator 7.01 installed.
Also (may be it helps) I've MS Office XP installed.

ReGet Deluxe has been previously reported to do something funny to the 
clipboard.
I will have to order a copy of it to debug further.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16011 ***
